submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: Optional. Comments that accompany the Approval submission.
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Submission Comments
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: comment

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: Optional. An array of one ID of the next approver, which can be a user or a group. Optional since some approval processes have the next approver(s) specified in the approval process definition.
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Next Approver IDs
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: nextApproverIds

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: Required. The ID of the record being submitted for approval.
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Record ID
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: objectId

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: Optional. The name or ID of the approval process to run against the record. If none is specified, the first approval process whose entry criteria the record satisfies is used.
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Approval Process Name Or ID
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: processDefinitionNameOrId

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: Optional. A Boolean value controlling whether the entry criteria for the specified approval process should be evaluated for the record (True) or not (False). If set to True, also specify processDefinitionNameOrId.
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Skip Entry Criteria
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: skipEntryCriteria

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: Optional. The ID of the user submitting the record for approval. If none is specified, the submitter will be the current user.
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Submitter ID
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: submitterId

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: An array of the ID(s) of the next approver(s).
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Next Approver IDs
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: actorIds

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: The ID of the record submitted for approval.
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Record ID
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: entityId

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: The ID of the approval process instance.
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Instance ID
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: instanceId

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: The status of the approval. The valid values are "Approved," "Rejected," "Removed," or "Pending."
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: Instance Status
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: instanceStatus

submitForApprovalActionParameters.description: An array of the ID(s) of the work item(s) created for the next step in this approval process.
submitForApprovalActionParameters.label: New Work Item IDs
submitForApprovalActionParameters.name: newWorkItemIds
